hero.title: Your peaceful corner in Sardinia
hero.subtitle: Discover the authentic beauty of Torpè. Just minutes from the crystal-clear sea of Posada, immersed in the tranquility of nature.

features.title: Our Services
features.subtitle: We have taken care of every detail to make your stay unforgettable, combining modern comfort with traditional Sardinian hospitality.

panoramicView.title: Panoramic View
panoramicView.description: Enjoy spectacular sunsets over the hills and the Fava castle from the private terrace.

airConditioning.title: Air Conditioning
airConditioning.description: Fresh and comfortable environments in all rooms for maximum summer relaxation.

wifi.title: Free Wi-Fi
wifi.description: High-speed connection to work remotely or watch streaming movies.

kitchen.title: Equipped Kitchen
kitchen.description: Everything you need to prepare delicious dinners with local Sardinian products.

parking.title: Parking
parking.description: Free private parking available right in front of the property.

location.title: Strategic Location
location.description: Just 5 minutes from the Olbia - Cagliari highway, 25 minutes from Olbia-Costa Smeralda airport, 10 minutes from the beach.

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Discover every corner of our apartment through photos. A preview of the comfort and beauty that await you.

excursions.title: Excursions and Places to Visit
excursions.subtitle: Discover the wonders of eastern Sardinia. Paradisiacal beaches, breathtaking mountains and cultural treasures await you just a few kilometers from home.
excursions.excursionTipsText: Our AI assistant Personal Assistant can provide you with detailed information on schedules, bookings and personalized advice for each destination. Don't hesitate to contact us to organize your perfect experience!

calaGoloritze.name: Cala Goloritzè Beach
calaGoloritze.description: The pristine and wild Cala Goloritzè, symbol of Baunei, is one of the coastal stretches of the Gulf of Orosei where sea and mountain meet in perfect harmony.

calaGinepro.name: Cala Ginepro Beach
calaGinepro.description: One of the most beautiful beaches in the area, with fine white sand and crystal-clear sea. Ideal for families and water sports.

berchida.name: Berchida Beach
berchida.description: Pristine beach surrounded by dunes and junipers, perfect for those seeking tranquility and wild nature.

calaLiberotto.name: Cala Liberotto
calaLiberotto.description: Small bay with turquoise waters and picturesque rocks. Great for snorkeling and diving.

orosei.name: Orosei Beach
orosei.description: Long golden sand beach with all services, restaurants and beach facilities.

monteAlbo.name: Monte Albo
monteAlbo.description: Limestone massif with panoramic trails and breathtaking views of the eastern coast. Trekking of various difficulty levels.

grotteMonteAlbo.name: Monte Albo Caves
grotteMonteAlbo.description: Natural cave system with spectacular rock formations. Guided tours available.

forestaSosNibberos.name: Sos Nibberos Forest
forestaSosNibberos.description: Ancient forest of holm oaks and cork oaks, perfect for nature walks and birdwatching.

oroseiCentro.name: Orosei Historic Center
oroseiCentro.description: Medieval village with historic churches, characteristic squares and traditional Sardinian architecture.

nuragheLoelle.name: Nuraghe di Loelle
nuragheLoelle.description: Well-preserved nuragic archaeological site, evidence of the ancient Sardinian civilization.

chiesaSanPietro.name: Church of San Pietro in Torpè
chiesaSanPietro.description: Ancient Romanesque church from the 12th century with frescoes and typical architecture of the period.

giroBarca.name: Boat Trip to Cala Luna
giroBarca.description: Boat excursion to the famous coves of the Gulf of Orosei, with snorkeling opportunities.

gorropu.name: Gorropu Gorge Trekking
gorropu.description: One of the deepest canyons in Europe. An unforgettable experience for trekking lovers.
